content.text: Match ends, Juventus 3, Chelsea 0.
Second Half ends, Juventus 3, Chelsea 0.
Giorgio Chiellini went off injured after Juventus had used all subs.
Sebastian Giovinco (Juventus) is shown the yellow card for excessive celebration.
Goal!  Juventus 3, Chelsea 0. Sebastian Giovinco (Juventus) right footed shot from outside the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Arturo Vidal with a through ball.
Offside, Juventus. Giorgio Chiellini tries a through ball, but Sebastian Giovinco is caught offside.
Substitution, Juventus. Paul Pogba replaces Fabio Quagliarella.
Corner,  Juventus. Conceded by Branislav Ivanovic.
Foul by Sebastian Giovinco (Juventus).
